mapper.select: SELECT i.prod_lot prod_lot , p.prod_name prod_name , i.sales_in_date sales_in_date , i.sales_in_amt sales_in_amt , i.prod_save_amt prod_save_amt , i.sales_in_exd sales_in_exd FROM sales_in i JOIN com_prod p ON (i.prod_code = p.prod_code) ORDER BY prod_lot

SELECT i.prod_lot , i.prod_code , i.sales_in_date , i.sales_in_amt , i.prod_save_amt , i.sales_in_exd , i.emp_code , e.emp_name , o.sales_out_code FROM sales_in i JOIN com_emp e ON (i.emp_code = e.emp_code) JOIN sales_out o ON (i.prod_lot = o.prod_lot)
AND prod_code LIKE '%' || #{prodCode} || '%'
AND TO_CHAR(sales_in_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= #{startDate}
AND TO_CHAR(sales_in_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= #{endDate}
AND o.sales_out_code = null
AND o.sales_out_code != null
ORDER BY prod_lot
SELECT prod_code, prod_name, prod_unit, prod_std FROM com_prod WHERE prod_kind = 'C' ORDER BY prod_code

SELECT i.prod_lot , i.prod_code , i.sales_in_date , i.sales_in_amt , i.prod_save_amt , i.sales_in_exd , i.emp_code , e.emp_name , i.test_num FROM sales_in i JOIN com_emp e ON (i.emp_code = e.emp_code) ORDER BY prod_lot

SELECT q.test_num, q.prod_code, c.prod_name, q.test_date, q.test_amt , n.prod_lot, n.sales_in_date, n.sales_in_amt, n.prod_save_amt, n.sales_in_exd FROM prod_quality q LEFT JOIN sales_in n ON (n.test_num = q.test_num) LEFT JOIN com_prod c ON (q.prod_code = c.prod_code) WHERE n.test_num IS NULL AND q.total_test_yn = 'Y' AND q.test_semi_yn = 'C' ORDER BY q.test_date
